title: CIP-8 User Authentication
description: A JSON payload used for CIP-8 wallet signing and authenticating a user to a particular URI

expiration.title: Nonce Expiration
expiration.description: The time when this nonce will be expired and become invalidated for purposes of authentication

issued.title: Nonce Issued
issued.description: The time when this nonce was generated by the validator server.

nonce.title: Nonce Value
nonce.description: A cryptographically-secure random string of characters used only once to secure this particular authentication session. Good example is a UUIDv4

type.title: Object Type
type.description: Identify the type of signing object for use by wallets to show an interface based on object type

uri.title: URI (Universal Resource Identifier)
uri.description: This should be a valid URI describing the service the user is authenticating to.

userID.title: User ID
userID.description: The User Identification (usually a staking key) that is being authenticated

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of this schema being implemented
